entry.title: Removal Of "Higher Religion" Does Not Produce Atheism Because Of People's Innate Inclinations Towards Supernatural Beliefs

blockquote.p: With the decline in institutional religion in the West one would predict folk beliefs to reemerge [due to humans innate predisposition toward supernatural beliefs], as the control of mass belief by the elites is no longer enforced by the state or higher institutions.

div.p: from "Who believes in the evil eye?"
